Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage took 5 wickets for 27 runs
India lost 9 wickets to spinners for the third game straight
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka secured a first ODI bilateral series win against India in 27 years
India's struggles against spin were highlighted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's spinners ended India's 27-year streak of winning against them in ODI bilateral series
